addr: 21-25 St John's Hill London SW11 1TT GB
title: London Motor Film Festival 2015
desc: For the second time, The Grand in Clapham, London plays host to the London Motor Film Festival. Get your suit on and join us on the red carpet for a night of jury selected automotive works and drinks! Films will be shown on a giant 40sqm (24?x15?) state of the art digital projection screen (the largest sports screen in the UK) in full HD with stunning full range sound. Event Details: Sunday 29th November. 6PM opening till late (access from 3PM for shortlisted film makers, VIPs, sponsors) with exclusive after party from 10pm. Black tie dress code (or jacket and tie, not enforced but strongly encouraged!). 18+ only, ID required on entry. General Admission - ?15 Access from 6PM for viewing of films, access to after party. VIP Package - ?25 Exclusive 3PM early opening, private bar, free glass of bubbly, buffet catering, round table or balcony seating. Shortlisted entrants entitled to two VIP tickets.
